trans-unit.source: Represents a panel in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref> control.
ToolStripStatusLabel is a version of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel> designed specifically for use in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>.

The special features include <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.BorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.BorderSides%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.Spring%2A>.
A ToolStripStatusLabel can contain text or an icon that reflects the status of an application.
Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection> class to find, add, or remove ToolStripStatusLabel objects.

Although ToolStripStatusLabel replaces and adds functionality to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> control of previous versions, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"></xref> class that displays the specified image.
An <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> that is displayed on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"></xref> class that displays the specified text.
A <xref:System.String> representing the text to be displayed on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"></xref> class that displays the specified image and text.
A <xref:System.String> representing the text to be displayed on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"></xref>.
An <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> that is displayed on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"></xref>.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"></xref> class that displays the specified image and text, and that carries out the specified action when the user clicks the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"></xref>.
A <xref:System.String> representing the text to be displayed on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"></xref>.
An <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> that is displayed on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"></xref>.
Specifies the action to carry out when the control is clicked.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"></xref> class with the specified name that displays the specified image and text, and that carries out the specified action when the user clicks the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"></xref>.
A <xref:System.String> representing the text to be displayed on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"></xref>.
An <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> that is displayed on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"></xref>.
Specifies the action to carry out when the control is clicked.
The name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"></xref>.
Gets or sets a value that determines where the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"></xref> is aligned on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref>.
The meaning of the Alignment property is affected by the setting of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.RightToLeft%2A> property.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemAlignment"></xref> values.
Gets or sets a value that indicates which sides of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"></xref> show borders.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabelBorderSides"></xref> values.
The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabelBorderSides"></xref>.
Gets or sets the border style of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"></xref>.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Border3DStyle"></xref> values.
The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Border3DStyle"></xref>.
The value of BorderStyle is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Border3DStyle"></xref> values.
Gets the default margin of an item.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> representing the margin.
Retrieves the size of a rectangular area into which a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"></xref> can be fitted.
The custom-sized area for a control.
An ordered pair of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref>, representing the width and height of a rectangle.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Paint"></xref> event.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.

Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"></xref> automatically fills the available space on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref> as the form is resized.
Set the Spring property to `true` to enable the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> to smoothly resize along with its container.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"></xref> automatically fills the available space on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref> as the form is resized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
